AT SOCIETY'S FOREFRONT
I think it is right to thank Nature for being at the forefront of the social debate on topics of current importance for research and science. This new editorial (1) on the value of universities in the 21st century captures well the s

peer_reviews.title: Universities challenged
peer_reviews.summary:
WHEN THE UNIVERSITY MAY NOT RESIDE IN THE BUILDING YOU ARE IN
Following on Nature's editorial about the future university (1), Schleim (2) made a good and poignant contribution encompassing both the Magna Charta Universitatum Europaeum (3) and the Bologna
